abstract.p: Bobbi Merkel Scott is named to new position of managing partner at Einson Freeman; Neil Miller is named to post of chief operating officer at TN Media (S)

block.p: Bobbi Merkel Scott was named to the new position of managing partner at Einson Freeman, Chicago, part of the WPP Group. She had been vice president for brand development at the Boston Beer Co., Boston. Neil Miller was named to the new post of chief operating officer at TN Media, New York, the media services agency of True North Communications. He had been chief financial officer at MindShare North America, New York, the media services joint venture of two units of the WPP Group: Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide and J. Walter Thompson.
